title: Angelic Warfare Confraternity Novena
description: Conquer temptation and reclaim purity. Pray now for the angelic protection promised by St. Thomas Aquinas. Experience true freedom in body and soul.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In this novena I pray for the grace of (mention request here‚Ä¶) St Thomas Prayer for Chastity Dear Jesus, I know that every perfect gift, and especially that of chastity, depends on the power of Your providence. Without You, a mere creature can do nothing. Therefore, I beg You to defend by Your grace the chastity and purity of my body and soul. And if I have ever imagined or sensed anything that could stain my chastity and purity, blot it out, Supreme Lord of my powers, that I may advance with a pure heart in Your love and service, offering myself on the most pure altar of Your divinity all the days of my life. Amen. Prayer to St Thomas for Chastity Chosen lily of innocence, pure St. Thomas, who kept chaste the robe of baptism and became an angel in the flesh after being girded by two angels, I implore you to commend me to Jesus, the Spotless Lamb, and to Mary, the Queen of Virgins. Gentle protector of my purity, ask them that I, who wear the holy sign of your victory over the flesh, may also share your purity, and after imitating you on earth may at last come to be crowned with you among the angels. Amen.

For our society and culture. Hail Mary For our relationships. Hail Mary For modesty. Hail Mary For our fives senses. Hail Mary For our sensuality. Hail Mary For our imagination. Hail Mary For our memory. Hail Mary For our power of estimation. Hail Mary For our affectivity. Hail Mary For our intellect. Hail Mary For our will. Hail Mary For our conscience. Hail Mary For our hearts. Hail Mary For self-surrender. Hail Mary For love. Hail Mary

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
